channel.title: Suggestions for this Program?
channel.description:
Seeming it didnt work out so well on another forums ill try here :s (completly c&p from the other forums for anyone who seen it there) any suggestions toward what armour sets to add would be nice and/or fix of the level requirments.
P.S if you want the source code itself rather than dling just ask and ill post.
Runescape Firecape Gear and Inventory Calculator - V1
Currently fixing bugs and adding more handled items with prices
Calculates what you should wear and bring with you to take down Jad, very precise.
Personalized Pures, Zerks, Rune pures, Inits, Pros', Barrows, Tanks, Mains, Rich People, Welfare People.
NOTE: There are minor flaws with the calculations for item costs, which is why only so few are handled, such as Elysian shield etc.
All comments, bugs, or other items that could be added, please notify me!
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?djnwjw2dice]http://www.mediafire.com/?djnwjw2dice[/url] [url=http://uppit.com/v/GZUOKN4L]http://uppit.com/v/GZUOKN4L[/url]
Patch 1.1: [url=http://uppit.com/v/z8yrdp7i]http://uppit.com/v/z8yrdp7i[/url]
Remember this is V1! 100% open source, still tiny flaws i have to fix later on. This is an upgrade from my Snape grass calculator, and theres still many things to finish, such as a complete set of items for all users with price handlers. I will also be looking into the loading of icons for each item that is recomended, for more visual features.
[B][SIZE="4"]POST OR IT WILL BE GONE FOREVER[/SIZE][/B]
Images; [URL=http://img32.imageshack.us/i/100226221651.png/][IMG]http://img32.imageshack.us/img32/5337/100226221651.th.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img13.imageshack.us/i/100226221720.png/][IMG]http://img13.imageshack.us/img13/8342/100226221720.th.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img31.imageshack.us/i/100226221736.png/][IMG]http://img31.imageshack.us/img31/4892/100226221736.th.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img268.imageshack.us/i/100226221802.png/][IMG]http://img268.imageshack.us/img268/1604/100226221802.th.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img40.imageshack.us/i/100226221823.png/][IMG]http://img40.imageshack.us/img40/488/100226221823.th.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img519.imageshack.us/i/100226221903.png/][IMG]http://img519.imageshack.us/img519/4520/100226221903.th.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img52.imageshack.us/i/100226224037.png/][IMG]http://img52.imageshack.us/img52/484/100226224037.th.png[/img][/URL]
